basics.name: Santiago Martin Puleio
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Hello, I’m Santiago Martín Puleio, and at 21 years old, I discovered my deep interest in programming. My primary goal is to specialize in software development. I’m constantly seeking new opportunities to keep learning, always aiming to improve. So far, I’ve gained knowledge in languages such as Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, and SQL, as well as frameworks like Astro and SpringBoot. I enjoy applying what I learn to real projects and consider teamwork crucial. I’m excited about the idea of participating in challenging projects, growing both personally and professionally, and contributing my unique skills to the team.

work.name: Municipalidad 3 de Febrero
work.summary: Development of interactive systems, task automation, and process digitalization (related to Stock, Patient Database, and Employee Database).

work.name: Complejo Hospitalario Norberto Di Prospero
work.summary: I created an automated stock system for the hospital’s purchasing department. For this, I used HTML (for forms and graphical interface), JavaScript (for the back end), and Google Sheets (as the inventory database). I was also responsible for maintaining the system and explaining to users the most efficient way to use it, tailoring it to their needs.

work.name: New Gadgets
work.summary: I developed an automated stock system with statistics (for clients, buyers, and sellers), a database of buyers and clients (differentiating between wholesalers and retailers), and a product visualization interface for potential buyers using the Astro framework (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript).

education.area: University Technical Degree in Software Development

projects.name: Ecommerce-Web
projects.description: Website created as an e-commerce model in Astro (using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript). Note: Purchases in this model are handled through WhatsApp as requested by the client. I am currently implementing the MercadoPago API.

projects.name: Travel System REST API
projects.description: REST API created with the Spring Boot framework (using Java and MySQL) to implement a complete travel system (user management, login, trip statuses, automated notifications, invoices, reviews, and payments) with the application of design patterns.

projects.name: Stock Manager
projects.description: Stock Manager in Sheets with HTML forms, Macros, and AppScript.

projects.name: Implementations (dynamic and static) in Java
projects.description: Static and dynamic implementations in Java, API creation, and testing.
